content: However you may have come upon this book is not important,
what is important though, is that you have come seeking knowledge.
This book has been written in order to provide a source of information about
a large number of different plants found throughout the world.
It is my hope as a scholar and an author that this book proves to be useful to you in some manner.
I am a wood elf born in the forests of Hithmika.
In my youth I spent many days wandering among the trees of my home forest and in the company of the druids.
Upon claiming my adulthood at 98 years of age,
I set out into the world to learn more about it and the immense variety of plant life that covers it.
The information in this book has been gathered during my long journey across the continent,
compounded from many different sources including my own research.
While other sources might, and will, delve deeper into the specifics of many families of plant life,
this book should serve as a source for much more general information and will cover many different plants.
